action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The relic sloth can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

reaction.name: Slow but Sturdy
entries: When the relic sloth is subjected to an effect that would move it out of its current space or knock it {@condition prone}, it is neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.
